original_title: UFC Fight Night 153: Gustafsson vs. Smith
overview: UFC Fight Night 153: Gustafsson vs. Smith was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on June 1, 2019 at the Ericsson Globe in Stockholm, Sweden. A light heavyweight bout between former UFC Light Heavyweight Championship challengers Alexander Gustafsson and Anthony Smith was the event's headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 153: Gustafsson vs. Smith
